一、抖音本地生活服务商入驻条件及流程

入驻标准如下:抖音生活服务服务商入驻审核均为平台统一标准，意向公司可先行自查对比自身规划及业务实际情况判断是否进行入驻申请

1、合作意愿

（1）具备长期在抖音生活服务业务投入的规划与意愿

2、工商资质

（1）具备独立法人资格

（2）营业执照注册资金不低于50万元

（3）公司经营状况良好，无债务纠纷

（4）营业执照与平台主体/产品/品牌名称相似度不高

（5）营业执照经营范围符合要求，需包括但不限于设计、制作、 代理、发布各类广告、计算机服务(除互联网上网服务营业场所)，计算机领域内的技术开发、技术转让、技术咨询、技术服务、商务咨询、会展服务、营销策划、电视节目制作中的任意一个

3、公司规模

公司员工总数≥20人

4、合作资源

（1）商家资源≥20家

（2）达人资源≥20个

【合作后我店已经属于停业状态】 1、在签约前什么都不讲，打着帮你提升抖音店铺权重、质量分、店铺装修等等套路，绑定你的抖音来客，恶意操作，诱骗签约 2、在签合同前不说明抽佣内容，签约之后询问才表露要抽取整店销售额的13个点，妥妥的吸血鬼，发现之后询问情况，态度极其恶劣，找杭州回客科技公司反馈，他们也是不管不问的态度，完全是一帮z骗团伙 3、签约前有询问是否可以随时解除合同的问题，郭旭口口声声说随时解除，没有任何违约金、赔偿金等等，现在不合作了需要解除又是另外一副嘴脸，完全不无谓的态度告诉我“随你便，等官方判定啊”，真是太嚣张了，难道抖音服务商就会得到抖音官方的庇护？ 4、服务上面，在合作不到24小时就被发现上当受骗，及时约他们上门谈解除合作的问题，他们当面同意，说回去申请就解除，但是，晚上再询问的时候却说已经开始服务了，还随便上传了两个视频，在此期间我没有收到任何达人来探店，其次，也没见到杭州回客科技公司有任何员工带着达人来我店里拍摄取素材，我就想问这就是达人视频？这就是你们公司的服务？视频内容不包含任何我店铺的产品以及店铺内容，只是加了个定位而已，那这样的话是不是随便找个人都能做服务商了？ 关于达人视频这块，也有询问杭州回客的工作人员郭旭，他理直气壮的说他有资源，说达人他都认识，都可以要到我店里的素材，我就想问问，我自己找的达人去拍摄，去发布的，管你什么事？那你要是更简单点直接就能去我抖音企业账号里面直接窃取，简单拼凑一下就能发布了，这就是你们的服务？这就是你们的专业？真是可耻、可恨的行为！ 5、还回到抽佣的问题，抖音来客抽佣规则（部分）： 《一》合作期前，所有订单何时核销，代运营服务商均不获得佣金 《二》合作期中，达人带货订单，a、达人合作关系由商家自行建立，则代运营服务商不获得佣金；b、达人合作关系由代运营服务商建立，则代运营服务商可获得佣金，达人佣金将从代运营佣金中扣除，不单独扣除商家货款； 现在又是怎样呢？先是不提相关规则，其次是偷偷的抽取合作商家的总销售额，就相当于什么都不干，占股13%，想什么呢？玩套路？我就很想问下杭州回客科技公司是全体z骗吗？就是这样赚取商户利益的？ 最后，请大家选择服务商代运营的时候一定要擦亮眼睛，不要像我这样傻傻的被套路，榨取我店的血汗钱，同时也请黑猫官方、抖音官方重视此事，核实此事，维护广大商家的权益！

In today’s digital world, technology plays a significant role in enhancing our entertainment, connectivity, and on-the-go power needs. In this blog post, we will explore three innovative devices that have redefined the way we consume media, experience virtual reality, and stay powered up on our adventures. Get ready to dive into the world of Google Chromecast, Oculus Quest 2, and Romoss Power Banks, and discover the possibilities they offer. Google Chromecast: Seamless Media Streaming Made Simple: Google Chromecast is a versatile media streaming device that transforms your TV into a smart entertainment hub. Key features and benefits include: a. Wireless Streaming: With Chromecast, you can wirelessly stream your favorite movies, TV shows, music, and more from your smartphone, tablet, or computer to your TV. It provides a seamless and convenient way to enjoy your content on the big screen. b. Wide App Compatibility: Chromecast supports a variety of popular streaming services, including Netflix, YouTube, Spotify, Disney+, and many more. You can easily cast content from these apps to your TV, expanding your entertainment options. c. Multi-Room Audio: With Chromecast Audio, you can synchronize multiple Chromecast devices to create a multi-room audio experience. Enjoy your favorite tunes throughout your home with just a few taps. d. User-Friendly Setup: Setting up Chromecast is quick and straightforward. Simply plug it into your TV’s HDMI port, connect to your Wi-Fi network, and start casting your content effortlessly. Oculus Quest 2: Immersive Virtual Reality at Your Fingertips: The Oculus Quest 2 is a next-generation virtual reality (VR) headset that offers an immersive and interactive experience. Key features and benefits include: a. Wireless VR Gaming: Oculus Quest 2 provides a wire-free virtual reality experience, allowing you to move freely and engage in games and experiences without being tethered to a PC or console. It provides a new level of freedom and immersion in VR gaming. b. Easy Setup and All-in-One Design: The Quest 2 is a standalone VR headset that does not require any additional hardware or sensors. It has built-in tracking, controllers, and a library of games and apps, making it easy to set up and start enjoying VR content right out of the box. c. High-Quality Visuals and Performance: The Quest 2 offers impressive graphics and performance, with a high-resolution display and a powerful processor. It delivers stunning visuals and smooth gameplay, enhancing your VR experience. d. Social Interaction: With the Quest 2, you can connect with friends and join virtual communities, participating in multiplayer games and social experiences. Explore new worlds and connect with others in ways never before possible. Romoss Power Banks: Portable Power Solutions for On-the-Go Needs: Romoss Power Banks are portable and reliable charging devices that keep your devices powered up wherever you are. Key features and benefits include: a. High Capacity and Fast Charging: Romoss Power Banks come in various capacities, providing multiple charges for your smartphones, tablets, and other USB-powered devices. They offer fast charging capabilities, allowing you to quickly recharge your devices on the go. b. Compact and Portable: Designed with portability in mind, Romoss Power Banks are lightweight and compact, making them ideal for travel, outdoor activities, or emergencies. Slip them into your bag or pocket, and you’ll have reliable power whenever you need it. c. Multiple Device Charging: Romoss Power Banks are equipped with multiple USB ports, enabling you to charge multiple devices simultaneously. Keep your phone, tablet, smartwatch, or other devices powered up at the same time, eliminating the need for multiple chargers or outlets. d. Safety and Efficiency: Romoss Power Banks are built with advanced safety features, including overcharging, overcurrent, and short circuit protection. This ensures the safety of your devices and prevents any potential damage from power surges or fluctuations. Conclusion: Google Chromecast, Oculus Quest 2, and Romoss Power Banks represent the epitome of connectivity, entertainment, and portable power solutions. With Google Chromecast, you can transform your TV into a smart hub and enjoy seamless streaming of your favorite content. Oculus Quest 2 takes virtual reality to new heights, providing an immersive and wire-free gaming experience. Romoss Power Banks offer reliable and portable charging for your devices, ensuring you stay connected and powered up on the go. These devices exemplify the innovation and convenience that technology brings to our daily lives. Whether you’re looking to enhance your entertainment experience, immerse yourself in virtual reality, or have reliable power wherever you go, Google Chromecast, Oculus Quest 2, and Romoss Power Banks are designed to meet your needs. Embrace the power of connectivity, entertainment, and portability with these exceptional devices and elevate your digital lifestyle.
